title: AIML - Research Engineer - AI Interpretability & Safety
summary: Apple’s AIML team is looking for a dedicated Research Engineer to advance the state of the art in evaluation and development of modern machine learning models with a focus on real-world use of artificial intelligence. The candidate will use their expertise to develop interactive systems and strategies that make our AI systems more safe, transparent, and understandable.
description:
-  Define and implement research directions at the forefront of interpretable machine learning.
-  Design and implement new tools and visualizations to make designing, building, and deploying machine-learning based products faster and easier.
-  Investigate innovative machine learning, and artificial intelligence algorithms.
-  Contribute to a variety of projects around Apple, and transfer your ideas into solutions for some of the most ambitious technical problems in the next generation of Apple products.
